summary: An anarchist young woman breaks the tacit contract with civilization and fearlessly decides on a life without hypocrisy or an obligatory safety net.
cast: Lilith Stangenberg|Georg Friedrich|Nelson|Cossa|Silke Bodenbender|Saskia Rosendahl|Kotti Yun|Laurie Young|Joy Maria Bai|Pit Bukowski|Benedikt Lay|Tamer Yigit|Hayder Yilmaz|Frowin Wolter|Anne-Kathrin Gummich|Franziska Arndt|Mila Bruk|Christine Voigt|Stefan Noebel-Heise|Wolfgang Howe|Hermann Beyer
title: Wild
